A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Jedi is truly a visual spectacle\, and yet the the only scene which I enjoyed was Frank Oz's nostalgic Yoda appearance. The rest of the movie was one long drawn out non-stop and nonsensical series of events which made mehope that the characters would die off as you can't identify with a single one. Where the original films are about friendship\, betrayal and reconciliation\, this movie was a showcase of special effects without any heart. A bad Star Wars and an terrible movie.
